page.title: 14Bus services Dargate/Blean
page.content: Service 637/8 passes through Dargate /NW corner/. There are 5 buses per day Whitstable to Faversham and 6 per day in the opposite direction, Mondays to Saturdays. No Sunday buses. The service is shared by East Kent Road Car Co. and Donsway Coaches, a private company. The most regular users are school children in term time when it is sometimes standing room only. From time to time we hear rumours that the service is to be cut further. Homey Hill /NE corner/ is much better served as it is on the A290 between Whitstable and Canterbury. Red double-decker buses travel in each direction at 20 minute intervals during the week and every hour on Sundays. The service is very popular and well used with extra buses being put on at rush hours.
